title: Lucian is absolutely butchering the viable ADC pool and needs to be addressed NOW
body:
He's in every game. He builds the same items every game. There are two other viable picks - {{champion:51}} and {{champion:81}}, who are viable just because they can stay alive to farm against him.

This habit that Riot has of leaving blatantly OP champs alone for too long has been a problem in the past, but I can't remember it ever killing diversity as much as what's going on right now in the bot lane.

replies.body: He has nerfs on the pbe, if you want to complain wait for the nerfs to hit live and to see if they add more on the pbe

This. People really need to stop making threads like this when Riot is actively looking to nerf a problematic champion. Gutted range on his Q is going to hurt his harass potential a lot in the laning phase, especially against longer-ranged champions like Ezrael and Cait.
Ez and cait are already the only ones that still viable, not sure how effective the change will be at letting people pick stuff OTHER than the 3.

Tbh the marksmen update, while a step in the right direction, didn't actually solve the issue of Marksmen diversity and strategic niche. Riot should probably do another pass to these characters and push the intended designs even more so that choosing an ADC revolves more than around ''Who deals the most damage''.
It's great that he's being nerfed but I'm saying it needs to happen sooner because he's been crowding out other champs for months.

The patch is coming _this week_...

Patches come every two weeks, usually on Wednesdays but in this case it may be Thursday.

You clearly have no clue what's going on. "needs to happen sooner". Barring EXTREME situations, riot balances every 2 weeks. Guess what tomorrow (I guess in this case thursday because reasons) is? PATCH DAY.

You lost all credibility by not understanding this basic information.

it's funny that you accuse the poster of 'not understanding the basic information' when you lack basic comprehension yourself.  The OP is saying that Riot needs to act faster when balancing champions who are obviously out of line.  And he's correct.  Some champs just spend weeks and months being broken or 'strictly better than' other champs in that role; they don't have a niche, they're just good all the time - like Lucian is now and has been for months - and that's a problem that needs to be rectified sooner than what it has been.

Dude it's the very next patch.

Yes he's very strong, but he wasn't full on insane nuts broken (he's less powerful than current state Zed) nor as in dire need of buffs as Taliyah(who got a hotfix).

Next patch is pretty soon be patient a little.
As I have said in many threads, Lucian is *being* addressed in 6.11.

I have never had a problem against Lucian, ever. I've played him before but I main Jhin and Jayce (yes, Jayce.) in ADC roles and I always come out on top. A lot of it depends on the support. Also, people don't realize you don't _have to pick fights in bot lane_. Play defensively because regardless of what people think, Lucian does have a short-medium range at best and isn't going to dive you under tower and 100-0 you.

I don't think that messing with the power of mid and top ADs should come from one ADC who is out of line. 

And in any case, he was moderately strong before then with Essence Reaver. Not the best, but still a mid/high-tier ADC.

I have to say that lucian is op because of his chain of abilities. Slow down any videos by doublelift or gosu, and you'll notice the harass combo:
auto+immediate q+immediate auto+his passive shot. All this happens in the time it takes another adc to land 2 autos. Lucian has effectively landed 3-4 autos worth of damage.
It also looks like they cancel the q animation sometimes.

People complaining about champs and asking for heavy nerfs is what destroys the diversity of the game because people stop playing them and find a better champ. There is always gonna be that champ that is just really strong and people will always want to play the strongest champ. So instead of fighting a battle you can't win, start finding team comps that can beat them. Or a play style that will beat them. I main ADC too. Im silver so ill probably get shit on by you, but still. Lucian is not that annoying.
It's not that he's annoying, it's just annoying to play against him every game, every day, for a month.

I can beat him I just have to pick Cait or Ezreal. And I don't like doing that.
He's not batshit broken, but the amount of effort the Lucian player has to put in is highly disproportionate to the amount I have to put in when playing another ADC. He gets to coast off of his reliable power spikes and spells too much.
It says something about this meta that you have to plan to go against a lane bully **every. single. game.**
I do hate the champion because of how much of a lane bully he is, but he has a healthy win rate. If they nerf his early game, they'll have to buff his late game.
Caitlyn's burst is ridiculous if she catches you with heashot>net>headshot, its so difficult to deal with if youre playing a melee or short ranged champion.
